Package moblima.controller

Class BookingController

  • java.lang.Object
    • moblima.controller.BookingController
  • public class BookingController
extends java.lang.Object
    Represent a booking controller that assist moviegoer in their booking Gets parameters from views that are visited by moviegoer

      • printSeatLayout

        public static void printSeatLayout()
        Print seat layout which includes entrance, screen, row number and column number. Allows user to have a picture of the cinema where the showtime will be displayed. Allows easy choosing of seats by row number and column number.
